title: Best of The Program | 10/12/20
description:
Yelp will tag businesses accused of racism, and Antifa is planning to exploit it. Glenn dives into Joe Biden’s genealogy and reveals how some of his ancestors were slaveholders. Will the leftist cancel culture care at all? Supreme Court nominee Amy Coney Barrett’s Senate hearing has begun. In his opening statements, Sen. Ben Sasse explains the difference between civics and politics and argues against politicizing the court.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
